snippet: A barge separated from its mooring for the third time Sunday and, for the first time, the contractors building the replacement bridge were penalized for the safety lapse.
abstract: Runaway barge rushes down choppy Hudson River for three miles after coming loose from its mooring near center span of Tappan Zee Bridge; it is third time that a barge deployed to build the replacement for the bridge broke from its mooring; New York State Thruway Authority says it is penalizing Tappan Zee Constructors by withholding up to $1 million in monthly 'progress payments.'
lead_paragraph: A barge separated from its mooring for the third time Sunday and, for the first time, the contractors building the replacement bridge were penalized for the safety lapse.

headline.main: Runaway Barge Irks Tappan Zee Officials
headline.print_headline: Runaway Barge Irks Tappan Zee Officials
